DOC.brief_summary: A randomised open-label pilot study assess safety efficacy treatment drug elute balloon alone coronary de novo lesion ) . Elective patient require PCI coronary de novo lesion vessel 2.5 mm - 4.0 mm .
DOC.brief_title: The Treatment Coronary De-novo Lesions With Elutax Paclitaxel-eluting Balloon Alone , Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Patient ≥ 18years old Stable angina symptom Elective treatment coronary lesion Reference vessel diameter ≥ 2.5mm ≤ 4.0 mm visual inspection Left main stem lesion Bifurcation lesion Acute coronary syndrome ( UAP , NSTEMI , STEMI ) Cardiogenic shock Chronic total occlusion Additional lesion require PCI Platelet count ≤ 50 x 109/mm3 Left ventricular ejection fraction ≤ 30 % Patient life expectancy le 12 month Known allergy aspirin , clopidogrel , prasugrel , heparin , stainless steel , intravenous contrast ( severe ) , paclitaxel Participation another investigational drug device study Patient unable give inform consent
